articleContent:
Food, drink, songs, and laughter—amid the season of revelry, we keep the festivities alive without pause. How do you like your time in Rinascita, Rover?
Aftertunes of the celebration still linger, and now, a couple of friends are preparing to send you their heartfelt wishes and gifts...
 
✦Duration✦
2025-01-29 00:00 - 2025-02-13 03:59 (UTC+8)
 
✦Rewards✦
2025-01-29 00:00 (UTC+8) - Event's Conclusion: Astrite x800
2025-01-30 00:00 (UTC+8) - Event's Conclusion: Astrite x400
2025-01-31 00:00 (UTC+8) - Event's Conclusion: Astrite x400
 
✦Eligibility✦
Reach Union Level 2.
 
✦How to Claim✦
- Rewards will be distributed through in-game mail on designated days.
- During the event, all players who have reached Union Level 2 and unlocked the Mail feature will be eligible. The rewards can be claimed until the next version update.
